column1: Uchi////I really love this place...wish they had one in LA. It's not cheap exactly but cheaper and much better than some of the really 'fancy' sushi places (ones that come to mind - matsuhisa
column2: katsuya to name a couple). favorite thing is to come for happy hour
column3: get a couple things off there
column4: then get some sushi off the normal menu (sushi is basically the only thing I get there). My favorite is the uni
column5: but all the sushi is really good. Their big thing is taking traditinoal sushi and adding a subtle twist/flavor
column6: which is what makes it really unique. Highly recommended!
